Documentation: The inbound delivery number is part of the unique identifier of the inbound delivery.
The line number is part of the unique identifier of the inbound delivery line.
The LU-ID of the physical LU
Is a part of the unique identification of an item.
The batch concerning the ordered or delivered goods.
Is part of the unique identification of a quantity unit.
The order amount copied from the inbound delivery note. This amount must not be changed during processing the delivery line.
